headline: Cincinnati investigating police recruit's training injury: What happened to John Brown?
author: Sharon Coolidge
sentences: Curp, who started as interim manager on Jan. 17, joined The Enquirer's "That's So Cincinnati" podcast to talk about how he sees the job of city manager and his view of City Hall since he departed in 2014 shortly after Mayor John Cranley was elected.
